titles.title: A bill to amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to include canned, dried, frozen, and pureed fruits and vegetables in the fresh fruit and vegetable program.
Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act of 2017
Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act of 2017
Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Fruit and Vegetables Access for Children Act of 2017
This bill amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to allow the Department of Agriculture Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Program to include canned, dried, frozen, or pureed fruits and vegetables. (Under current law, the program provides grants to states to make fresh fruits and vegetables available in elementary schools.)
